db:info.db:title: Qt OPC UA X509 Support Example
db:info.db:titleabbrev: An OPC UA module for Qt

db:abstract.db:para: Shows how to generate keys and certificate signing requests.

db:article.db:programlisting:
QT += opcua QT -= gui CONFIG += c++11 DEPENDPATH += INCLUDEPATH
SOURCES += main.cpp
#install target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/opcua/x509 INSTALLS += target
